item.description:
Handel and Haydn Society at the incomparable Symphony Hall in Boston!  There is NO BETTER PLACE to take in a classical concert!  Concertmaster Aisslinn Nosky makes her H&H solo debut in Vivaldi’s virtuosic The Four Seasons. Audiences tour Italy, from Handel’s operas written during his time in Italy to J.C. Bach’s dramatic symphony written just after his stay in Italy. 

 "Aisslinn Nosky's electric presence and scarlet red pixie haircut accent her masterful musicianship.” Read more about this incredible and energetic young violinist here:
http://www.handelandhaydn.org/concerts/artists/aisslinn-nosky

The program is fantastic and includes:

 * Handel: Overture to Agrippina
* Corelli: Concerto Grosso in C Minor, Op. 6, No. 3
* J.C. Bach: Symphony Op. 6, No. 6 in G Minor
* Handel: Overture to Rodrigo
* Corelli: Concerto Grosso in D, Op. 6, No. 4
* Vivaldi: The Four Seasons

Tickets are through BosTix at the reduced price of $40 per person, including fees.  (These tickets are normally $66!)  I will order all the tickets at once!  See below for payment information.  There will be an option to meet for dinner beforehand...I will send out info once I know how many people are coming!

PAYMENT INFO! 
Please send $40 via PayPal to me using this email: julie.chilton@yahoo.com.  (If you do not have Paypal and need to send a check, please contact me immediately.)  IMPORTANT!  When you pay with Paypal, please click the tab that says "Personal" and where it says "This money is being sent as" click on "payment owed."   I am going to be ordering the tickets FIRST THING FRIDAY MORNING.   I will only order for people who have paid! So if you'd like to come to this concert, please RSVP and pay as soon as possible!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the box office doors at 7:30pm!
item.name: Vivaldi's 4 Seasons (and more) at Symphony Hall!
